name: Small World 2 (Canceled)
blurb: Please read the Small World Reboot update right below. A new redesigned campaign will launch on March 12.

rewards.reward: No Reward

Pixies - The gratitude of all Small World inhabitants for helping fund the cool new features (3-5 player maps, asynchronous game server for online play, etc.) of this upgrade, plus access to our private Small World 2 discussion forum, with the Pixies forum badge, during the development of the game.

Skeletons - A digital download of the base game on 1 platform of your choice (iPad only, initially) and 3 new digital Special Powers exclusive to Kickstarter pledges + the previous tier rewards, upgraded to the Skeletons forum badge.

Halflings - Adds the Cursed!, Grand Dames, and Be Not Afraid... digital expansions to your base game, along with 3 new digital Races exclusive to Kickstarter pledges at this level and higher + all previous tiers rewards, upgraded to the Halflings forum badge.

Royal - Not an actual pledge level.\r\nThis is a free bonus we\u2019re adding to ALL pledges at the $ 30 Halflings level and above: You will receive a cardboard version for the board game of the 3 new Special Powers and 3 new Races Philippe is developing for this Kickstarter Campaign.

Orcs - The Hardcover Small World Encyclopedia of Races and Special Powers (filled with 84+ full-color pages of concept art, illustrations, strategic advice and trivia); and a really nice print of Small World artwork + all previous tiers rewards, upgraded to the Orcs forum badge.

Trolls - A digital copy of the base game and its expansions on ALL platforms that get funded during this campaign; the long-sleeved Small World Kickstarter backer T-shirt; 3 metal pins featuring everyone's favorite Small World races; and a listing of your name in a special Thank You section of the Credits of the digital game  + all previous tiers rewards, upgraded to the Trolls forum badge.

INTERNATIONAL (NON US) ONLY - Same rewards as for $ 180 Wizards level - You will be responsible for all custom or import fees, as well as any taxes, including VAT, that may occur as a result of us shipping your rewards to your home country.

Wizards - A complete copy of Small World - the Boardgame; along with 186 Deluxe Tokens, packaged in 15 sets that cover all base game races & the Lost Tribes + all previous tier rewards, upgraded to the Wizards forum badge.

Heroic - RECOMMENDED FOR EXISTING SMALL WORLD BOARDGAME AND IPAD OWNERS ONLY - The 3 new digital Races and Special Powers exclusive to Kickstarter Backers; the 307 Deluxe tokens described in the $240 Sorcerers reward level; and access to our private Small World 2 discussion forum, with the Heroic forum badge, during the development of the game. NO OTHER REWARDS OR UPGRADES (Book, T-shirt, standard Board game, digital versions, etc.) WILL BE INCLUDED IN YOUR REWARDS IF YOU PLEDGE AT THIS LEVEL. If you want it all, or don't own Small World the Board game and Small World iPad yet, please consider pledging at the Sorcerers level instead.

INTERNATIONAL (NON US) ONLY - Same rewards as for $ 181 Heroic level only - You will be responsible for all custom or import fees, as well as any taxes, including VAT, that may occur as a result of us shipping your rewards to your home country.

Sorcerers - Expands your Wizard's Deluxe Tokens sets to include all Cursed!, Grand Dames and Be Not Afraid Races... (an additional 121 tokens!) + all previous tier rewards, upgraded to the Sorcerers forum badge.

INTERNATIONAL (NON US) ONLY - Same rewards as for $ 240 Sorcerers level - You will be responsible for all custom or import fees, as well as any taxes, including VAT, that may occur as a result of us shipping your rewards to your home country.

INTERNATIONAL (NON US) ONLY - Same rewards as for $ 321 Dragon-Master level - You will be responsible for all custom or import fees, as well as any taxes, including VAT, that may occur as a result of us shipping your rewards to your home country.

Dragon-Master - RECOMMENDED FOR EXISTING SMALL WORLD BOARDGAME AND IPAD OWNERS ONLY - The 3 new digital Races and Special Powers exclusive to Kickstarter Backers; the Complete Small World Designer Edition described in the $400 Flames reward level; and  access to our private Small World 2 discussion forum, with the Dragon-Master forum badge, during the development of the game. NO OTHER REWARDS OR UPGRADES (Book, T-shirt, standard Board game, digital versions, etc.) WILL BE INCLUDED IN YOUR REWARDS IF YOU PLEDGE AT THIS LEVEL. If you want it all, please consider pledging at the Flames level instead.

INTERNATIONAL (NON US) ONLY - Same rewards as for $ 400 Flames level - You will be responsible for all custom or import fees, as well as any taxes, including VAT, that may occur as a result of us shipping your rewards to your home country.

Flames - An upgrade of your Sorcerer's Deluxe tokens sets to Philippe Keyaerts\u2019 Complete Small World Designer Edition - including super-sized 2-5 player maps, a new unique 6 player map, deluxe banners, special powers and markers to complement your 307 deluxe tokens, 109 metal coins, a resin dragon, catapult & heroes minis, and more; and a listing of your name in a special Thank You section of the Credits in this edition of the game + all previous tiers rewards, upgraded to the Flames forum badge.

INTERNATIONAL (NON US) ONLY - Same rewards as for $ 650 Amazons level - You will be responsible for all custom or import fees, as well as any taxes, including VAT, that may occur as a result of us shipping your rewards to your home country.

Amazons - An exquisitely detailed 3D figure of Small World's Amazon; your copy of the Complete Small World Designer Edition will also be signed and dedicated to you or the person of your choice + all previous tiers rewards, upgraded to the Amazons forum badge.

Spiderines - Design the Race or mini-expansion of your choice; we will professionally illustrate it, lay it, print it, and who knows? - maybe even publish it or code it into the game! -; a framed print-out of your Race or mini-expansion sheet signed by Artist Miguel Coimbra and Game Designer Philippe Keyaerts; and a listing of your name with the Avatar illustration of your choice in both the digital game and the Complete Small World Designer Edition rulebook + all previous tiers rewards, upgraded to the Spiderines forum badge.

Shadow Mimes - An invitation to DoW Europe for a lunch and game with Philippe Keyaerts and the developers of the game OR a visit to DoW US Headquarters for a lunch and game session with Eric and Mark - we will cover food and lodging for 2 nights; you must provide and pay for your own travel expenses -; an upgrade from the Amazon tier figure to the 3D race of YOUR choice; and exclusive access to beta builds of the game during development of the iPad edition + all previous tiers rewards, upgraded to the Shadow Mimes forum badge.

Dwarf Lord  - A uniquely detailed, large-scale, hand-painted 3D map of Small World in the player configuration of your choice; a unique Small World illustration of your choice signed by Artist Miguel Coimbra + all previous tiers rewards, upgraded to the Dwarf Lord forum badge.

Iron Dwarf  - A uniquely detailed, large-scale, hand-painted 3D map of Small World Underground in the player configuration of your choice; a unique Small World illustration of your choice signed by Artist Miguel Coimbra + all previous tiers rewards, upgraded to the Iron Dwarf forum badge.
